clinical_history: Patient presents with abdominal discomfort and bloating.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Right kidney demonstrates well-defined, no hydronephrosis.
Right ovary shows mildly heterogeneous appearance.
Prostate is ill-defined; volume approximately 24.15 cc.
Left kidney shows homogeneous, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Liver appears coarse with no focal lesions.
Testes are normal with normal vascularity.
Soft tissue region demonstrates mildly thickened without fluid collection.
Urinary bladder is coarse, no intraluminal lesions.
